===Adjective===

# [[cripple]]; [[disabled]] person

====Usage notes====
Translating loosely as "useless cripple," this term is widely considered derogatory to disabled people, and has been replaced in official parlance in China with the more neutral term {{zh-l|殘疾|physically disabled}}.
